gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
LINK VB

sense.def:
To feel an emotion or a sensation
pomeni doživeti neko čustvo ali občutek.

seg.quote: Mrs Oliver felt a sudden desire to burst out crying.
I was feeling hungry.
She felt a fool.
I felt like a murderer.

gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB, VB
with
COMPLEMENT,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
COMPLEMENT

sense.def:
To feel that something is the case
pomeni, da je po našem mnenju nekaj tako, kot pravimo.

seg.quote: He felt I was making a terrible mistake.
I felt obliged to invite him in.
He felt it necessary to explain why he had come.

sense.def:
To feel a particular way about something
pomeni imeti določen odnos do nečesa ali reakcijo na nekaj.

seg.quote: She knew how I felt about totalitarianism.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
it feels
izražamo določena čustva in občutke, ki so povezani z nekim doživetjem.

seg.quote: It felt good to be back.
What does it feel like to watch yourself on TV?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
it feels
izražamo vtis, ki ga nekaj naredi na nas, ko tisto primemo ali ko se tistega dotaknemo.

seg.quote: It feels like a normal fabric.
...the cool feel of armchair leather.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To feel something
pomeni zavedati se, da se nekaj dotika našega telesa ali da se z njim nekaj dogaja.

seg.quote: They felt the wind on their damp faces.
He could feel himself blushing.

sense.def:
To feel something
pomeni tudi, da se nečesa zavedamo, čeprav tistega ne moremo videti ali slišati.

seg.quote: He had felt Binta's presence in the hut.

sense.def:
To feel a physical object
pomeni namenoma se dotakniti nekega predmeta, da bi ugotovili, kakšen je.

seg.quote: Eric felt his face. ‘I'm all rough. Am I bleeding?’

sense.def:
To feel for an object
pomeni poskusiti najti neki predmet z rokami in ne z očmi.

seg.quote: She felt in her bag for her key.

sense.def:
To feel the effect or result of something
pomeni doživeti vpliv ali posledico nečesa.

seg.quote: We shan't feel the effect of the change for some years.

sense.def:
The feel of something
je splošni vtis, ki ga ustvari, na primer, neki kraj.

seg.quote: The Brazilian Amazon has the feel of a tropical wild west.

sense.def:
To feel like doing or having something
pomeni želeti si nekaj storiti ali imeti.

seg.quote: I feel like a stroll.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
does not feel oneself
, je nekoliko bolan.
